-spec length_of_longest_subsequence(Nums :: [integer()], Target :: integer()) -> integer().
length_of_longest_subsequence(Nums, Target) ->
  dp(Nums, Target, #{0 => 0}, -1).

dp([], 0, _, MaxLen) ->
  MaxLen;
dp([], _, _, MaxLen) ->
  MaxLen;
dp([H|T], Target, Map, MaxLen) ->
  NewMap = maps:fold(fun(K, V, Acc) ->
                       Sum = K + H,
                       if
                         Sum =< Target ->
                           Len = V + 1,
                           case maps:is_key(Sum, Acc) of
                             true -> Acc#{Sum => max(Len, maps:get(Sum, Acc))};
                             false -> Acc#{Sum => Len}
                           end;
                         true -> Acc
                       end
                     end, Map, Map),
  dp(T, Target, NewMap, max(MaxLen, maps:get(Target, NewMap, -1))).
